choices: A building with neon roses (Rumble Roses)
1.content:
Batman was on his Batcomputer examining evidence from a crime scene that was left for him; there were several photos of locations and one sticky note saying "Come for me"

The detective got out of his chair and made a plan of action, he was going to investigate the places in the photos and see where that could lead him and he knows where to start.
1.title: Intro

choices: Was stunned by a thrown object and slammed on the rooftop (Mai)
Teleported and crashed inside the tower (Athena)
11.content: Batman left his Bat-wing on auto-pilot as he ejected out of his seat and glided to Wayne Tower which for tonight was supposed to be empty so it was wired to see a light on in one of the top floors as he looked at his security cameras. Batman closed in on the skyscraper and then.....
11.title: Wayne Tower (King of Fighters)

12.content:
Rain poured heavily on the Batmobile's windshield as he approached a recently built building there were two neon roses hanging above the sign "Rumble Roses" Batman drove into a nearby alley and hopped out of his seat.

This place is an exclusive club for special events so if someone wanted him to come here then what could this place hide or at least what's the culprit's interest in this place? The club was closed for the night, Batman grappled to the rooftop to see if there was a more "subtle" way in, and when he got up there he was surprised to see a ceiling window open, like someone wanted him in.

Batman decided to go in anyway and has he landed on red tiled floor he saw that there was light coming from a room behind a bar, he went in to find another door with a flight of stairs going down; as the dark knight went downstairs he saw a wrestling ring but before he could properly investigate a arm wrapped around his neck and squeezed tight and before long; he passed out.
12.title: A building with neon roses (Rumble Roses)

info.brief_description: An anonymous threat has been seen to Batman; now he has find certain women and fight them
info.description:
In this story: Batman will face off against the women from various fighting games like Dead or Alive, Street Fighter, Tekken, King of Fighters, Rumble Roses and probably Soul Calibur.

RULES:
1. Batman will always be beaten, it is a femdom

2. Batman CAN be raped (if you want to) even if it's OOC for the girl he's fighting against

3. You can use any fetish you want.
